mapinfo.detailsText:
This open area of South America has an incredible abundance of resources. While hunts are a bit scarce, there is a variety of edible plants to be found everywhere. The rolling hills give way to a local trade route and you will find coin primarily scattered toward the edges of the map. 
 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Observer UI by Aizamk 
 


 Map by dansil92
